lead_paragraph: GEEHERN--Margaret K.,94, of Albany, formerly of Scarsdale. Born February 28, 1921 in Manhattan. She is survived by a daughter Constance (David) Novak of Albany and a grandson Jack Novak. She was predeceased by her husband Richard in 1997. Visitation Thursday, 4-8pm at Edwin L. Bennett Funeral Homes, Scarsdale. Funeral Mass Friday, January 22, 2016 at 10am, Our Lady of Fatima Church, Scarsdale. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GEEHERN, MARGARET K.
